item.title: 【Albums (lossy)】MP3 - Sarah Brightman - Winter in Paris (2023)
item.description:
Artist: Sarah Brightman
Album: Winter in Paris
Year: 2023
Format: mp3 320kbps
Genre: Pop, Classical Crossover
Note: Exclusive limited album released on in France & Belgium. Album incl. exclusive tracks and previously unreleased on CD concert highlights from "A Christmas Symphony"

Tracklisting
1. Le Bonheur est Multicolore (feat. Louisa & Mathias) [Exclusive Track] (3:05)
2. Winter Light (3:18)
3. I Believe in Father Christmas (Live at Christ Church Spitalfields, London) (3:46)
4. Amazing Grace (Live at Christ Church Spitalfields, London) (3:06)
5. Colder than Winter (Live at Christ Church Spitalfields, London) (4:05)
6. Arrival (Live at Christ Church Spitalfields, London) (3:18)
7. Happy Xmas (War is Over) (Live at Christ Church Spitalfields, London) (3:35)
8. Silent Night (Live at Christ Church Spitalfields, London) 3:11)
9. La Luna (Live at Christ Church Spitalfields, London) [Exclusive Track] (4:58)
10.Pie Jesu (Live at Christ Church Spitalfields, London) (3:51)
11.Voyage Voyage (with Gregorian) (3:58)
12.Done (3:43)
13.Watermark (2:33)
14.Ave Maria (with Vincent Niclo) [Exclusive Track] (4:12)
